addWorldEdgeBoundaries

public static org.jbox2d.dynamics.Body addWorldEdgeBoundaries(processing.core.PApplet app,
                                                              org.jbox2d.dynamics.World world,
                                                              float scale)
Adds an edgeShape around the world with a slight offset so that every shape hits the edge first before hitting the world boundaries.

Parameters:
app - the app
world - the world
scale - the scale
Returns:
the edge body
